refnamediv.refpurpose: Scan web server for known vulnerabilities

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Nikto is an Open Source web server scanner which performs comprehensive tests against web servers for multiple items that are generally considered dangerous. It checks for dangerous files, outdated server software, and other problems.
